summary: Chat app (Chattr) deployed on Caffeine/DFINITY platform. Plan Y (v335) is live: message IDs zero-padded to 9 digits in share links, font-mono on displayed IDs, X post iframe max-width 300px. Now removing visible message IDs from chat UI while keeping share/anchor functionality intact.
architectural_notes: Message IDs are used for share links and URL anchoring (e.g. /room/abc#000000042); display is separate from functionality
App is deployed on Caffeine/DFINITY platform at chattr-068.caffeine.xyz; custom domain config must go through Caffeine team

existing_features.title: In MessageBubble.tsx, remove the visible display of the message ID from the rendered chat bubble. The message ID must still exist on the DOM element (e.g., as an id or data attribute) so that URL anchor scrolling and share link functionality continue to work. Do not change any other part of the message bubble layout or logic.

new_feature_requests.summary: Hide message IDs from chat UI while keeping share link and URL anchor functionality intact
